name: kicad_bom_wizard
description: This KiCad plugin can be used to create custom BOM files based on easy configurable templates files.
author: Ronald Sousa (http://twitter.com/opticalworm)

scripts.test: rm -R Test/.tmp && mkdir Test/.tmp && node KiCad_BOM_Wizard.js "Example/example.xml" "Test/.tmp/output.html" "HTML" && node Test/pdfCreator_test.js
scripts.test_new: rm -R Test/.tmp && mkdir Test/.tmp && node KiCad_BOM_Wizard.js "Example/options.json"
scripts.test_old: standard KiCad_BOM_Wizard.js && node KiCad_BOM_Wizard.js "Test/Meter.xml" "Test/Meter.html" "HTML" && node KiCad_BOM_Wizard.js "Test/Meter.xml" "Test/Meter.csv" "CSV"
